column1: fuller around off, pushed back
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards backward square leg, off the mark
too full and straight, drives it towards long-on
fuller around off, pushed towards covers
length ball angling in, flicked towards midwicket
length ball on the stumps, goes for the sweep and misses. A big appeal for lbw but not given. I think it was going down
length ball at the stumps, looks to turn it on the leg side, an inside edge on to the pads and it bounces towards point
short of length around off, taps it on the leg side
length ball in the channel, looks to smash it over long-on but is nowhere near the ball, misses
length ball angling in, was looking to work it on the leg side, a leading edge rolls towards covers. Wanted a single but the cover fielder was quick to the ball
length ball angling in towards the off side, comes forward and flicks it towards short fine leg, sets off for a quick single
length ball outside off, drops it towards covers and gets an easy single
length ball angling in, looks to flick but misses. Struck on the pads but was heading down
pushed towards mid-on this time
length ball outside off, backs away and hits it flat, cannot beat the extra cover fielder
length ball on the stumps, flicked past square leg but the fielder in the deep puts in the chase and the slide to keep it to two
length ball around off, backs away and works it towards deep square leg
fuller on the stumps, takes his front leg out and hits it towards long-on, along the ground
length ball at the stumps, cramping the batsman who can just defend it back
slower one, down the leg side, Zazai was a touch early into the shot. Gets a leading edge but it just clears square leg
length ball angling in, hits the batsman on the pads and rolls to the left of the keeper. A chance of a run-out as Gurbaz charges down but Zazai is unmoved. The keeper misses the direc-hit
length ball angling in, defends it towards the bowler
first four of the innings. Uses the angle and pulls this length ball behind square leg
slower length ball, pulled in front of square leg this time. Only a single
length ball, following the batsman. Zazai backs away and works it towards long-on
length ball, gives himself some room and smashes it over deep midwicket
length ball, a touch quicker this time, punched towards long-on
length ball angling in on to the pads, looks to tuck it on the leg side but misses. A leg-bye to short third man
short of length around off, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, backs away and hits it towards wide long-on, along the ground
length ball outside off, clobbered towards deep midwicket, the fielder is there
fuller outside off, goes for a big one. Gets a thick outside edge over short third man who runs backwards, gets his both hands to it but fails to latch on to
length ball outside off, taps it towards covers
length ball around off, looks to smash but mistimes it towards the bowler
length ball at the batsman, backs away a bit and dabs it towards short third man
Rankin fails to make the stop this time. Another length ball, no room. Mistimes the flat-bat hit towards the bowler who fails to get a hand to it. Mid-on makes the sliding stop
left-arm over and that's in Zazai's arc. Sends it into the orbit over long-on
flatter and wider, looks to smash again but gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
length ball around off, goes back and works it towards mid-wicket
length but way too outside edge, Zazai cannot reach there
length outside off, goes for the cut but mistimes it towards the bowler
length outside off, punched towards long-off
down the track and works it towards deep square leg for a couple
fuller on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
length outside off, steered towards point
length ball around middle and leg, moves across and looks to flick it fine. Misses and is hit on the thigh. An appeal for lbw. But perhaps was going down, too high as well
length ball down the leg side, tickled away fine but looks like there is no bat involved as the umpire signals leg bye
slower bouncer, Zazai too early into the shot. Toe end of the bat and towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
down the track and lofted over long-on, all the way for a six
flatter and shorter. Goes back and works it towards long-on
brilliant catch by Delany, diving to his left and taking it with one hand. Was a length ball on the stumps, Zazai was looking to work on the leg side but manages only a leading edge
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and defends
length ball on the stumps, whips it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball around off, tucked away towards fine leg
length ball outside off, steers it towards point where Stirling makes a diving stop to his right
short and pulled away towards fine leg
short of length and another pull, much squarer this time but only a single once again
goes deep and clears his front leg but fails to middle this heave. A single to deep midwicket
length ball around off, pulls it in front of square leg, six singles from the over
down the track but ends up hitting to extra cover
use of feet once again but this time he slogs it over deep midwicket
punched towards covers for a quick single. There was a chance of run-out but the throw was wayward
length outside off, cuts it towards Stirling at point
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
quicker on the this time, tucked away towards midwicket
length outside off, a legcutter. Gurbaz was looking to steer it towards third man, gets beaten
short of length outside off, goes for the pull but ends up playing over the ball
slower one down the leg side, misses the pull but it's too wide even though the batsman had backed away
length outside off, works it behind point for one
short ball, goes for the pull but it comes off much slower, hits the batsman on the arm
too full, goes deep and clears his front leg, mistimes it towards deep midwicket

a brilliant yorker, jams his bat at it. Asghar is charging down and is almost at the other end. Gurbaz starts off too but the bowler does the intelligent thing, lobs the ball towards the extra cover fielder who runs to the non-striker's end and breaks the stumps. Gurbaz's dive goes in vain
length ball around off, worked towards square leg
length ball down the leg side, called a wide
length ball on the stumps, whipped towards square leg
length ball around off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket, finds the gap and the boundary
flatter around off, stays back and beside the line this time, steers it towards short third man
fuller around off, pushed towards long-on
length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
slower length ball, pulls it towards deep-backward square leg
length outside off, moves towards the off side and works it towards short midwicket. The bowler himself does the fielding
short of length, goes deep and pulls it over square leg, a maximum
short outside off and pulled towards midwicket this time, collects four more, one-bounce and over the rope
another short one and another pull, this should have been stopped. The long-on fielder puts in the slide but fails to prevent the boundary, Kevin O'Brien there
a low full toss outside off, hits it aerially but land short of long-on
fuller outside off, squeezes it out towards extra cover
length ball around off, pushed back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, goes back and pulls it over deep midwicket, Nabi showing his power there
fuller around off, comes forward and works it towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards long-on
fuller on the pads, flicked to the left of short fine leg
fuller around off, Nabi moves across and looks to work it on the leg side, misses but maybe the impact was just outside off, the ball races away to the third man fence
moves across once again and flicks it in front of square leg this time
almost in the blockhole, Asghar manages to get bat under it and whips it towards deep midwicket, Tector makes a mess of it
Young misses his mark this time and Asghar smashes it over deep midwicket this time
length outside off, a lot of width and Asghar throws his bat at it. Opens the face of the bat at the last moment and gets it up and over backward point.
a low full toss and launched over long-on for another six. A big over comes to an end, 25 from it
length outside off, pulls it towards deep square leg
length outside off, moves across and pulls it towards fine leg, beats the man there
fuller on the pads, flicked towards fine leg but only a single

fuller and wider outside off, Asghar looks to go leg side but gets a top edge. Extra cover moves takes a couple of steps back and collects it. But looks like Rankin has overstepped here. Yes, he has and Asghar survives
a full toss but Nabi fails to capitalise. Lofts it towards square leg where Simi Singh catches and fires the throw to the keeper. Nabi was quick to come back for the second
length ball, flicked in front of square leg, sprints back once again for the second. 150 comes up for Afghanistan
length ball outside off, pulled towards deep square leg and finally a catch results in a wicket
slower bouncer from around the wicket, mistimes the pull to the left of the keeper
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket
length ball at the batsman, goes for the pull but it hurries on to him, a single to backward square leg
slower length ball outside off, hardly bounces after landing. Zadran pulls over it
length ball around off, pushed towards long-off
slower length ball, goes for the pull but misses. Hit on the arm and they get a single as the ball bounces towards cover-point
length ball down the leg side, misses the flick but gets another leg bye, this to short fine leg
a yorker just outside off, Zadran looks to hit it through midwicket but misses
down the leg side and flicked towards deep-backward square leg
Asghar misses his half-century. A length ball outside off, and Asghar looks to clear long-on. Doesn't get the required distance and is caught for 49
length ball around off, pushed towards long-on
slower bouncer, Zadran goes for the pull but misses
length ball at the stumps, goes for the pull but misses. An appeal for lbw but too high maybe
length ball outside off and absolutely smashed over long-off
another one. A length ball at the stumps and this one sails over long-on, Zadran showing his class
goes again but fails to middle it, only a single to deep midwicket
slower delivery and smashed hard, Naib into the act now. Pulls it over deep square leg for a six
another maximum, 26 from the over as Naib lofts it this slower one over long-on
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards deep midwicket. Stirling wants the second run but Rashid with his rocket arm keeps it to one
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short fine leg
pitched up again, chipped towards the wide of long-on, Rashid cuts it off
makes room this time but gets an inside edge edge towards short fine leg
length outside off, hits it towards extra cover who mis-fields. Mid-off cuts it off
goes aerial, not from the middle of the bat but enough to clear mid-off and get a boundary
length ball at the stumps, goes for the pull and misses
too full, outside off. Scythes it towards extra cover for a quick single
length ball around off, goes down on one knee and looks to scoop. Misses and is hit on the thigh
length ball around off, stays beside the line of the ball and punches it towards extra cover
this time gives himself some room and hits it over extra cover, gets the boundary
length ball around off, drives it on the up but cannot beat extra cover
length ball angling in, looks to loft it over square leg but misses. Hit outside the line of the leg stump
goes himself room, goes for the slog sweep but misses
fuller outside off, O'Brien manages to get under that and lofts it over long-off
makes room and connects the sweep this time, gets it past short fine leg
another slog sweep, finer this time and over short fine leg. All the way for a six
a googly from outside off, O'Brien chips it over mid-off but ends up mistiming it. Karim Janat runs backwards and completes the catch after a bit of juggle
fuller outside off, drives on the up, lands just short of extra cover
slower one, pushes it towards the left of mid-off
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
inside out and lofted over extra cover, bounces just inside the boundary line
length ball outside off, stays inside the line and opens the face to work it towards covers
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-off and sets off. A direct-hit would have been close
top-edge as Stirling goes for a slog sweep and Najibullah Zadran pouches it at deep square leg
length ball on the stumps, defended back
length outside off, whipped towards deep midwicket
a googly from outside off, comes forward to defend, an inside edge on to the pads
length ball on the pads, flicked towards backward square leg
length ball at the stumps, pushed back
fuller outside off and driven square of the wicket, finds the gap
length ball angling in, dabbed towards third man
length ball, makes room and drives it between cover and extra cover for four more
length outside off, too close to cut, mistimes it towards point
comes down the track and squeezes it towards deep backward point, Nabi mis-fields and allows a second run
length outside off, pushed towards covers
length around off, pushed towards extra cover
slower length ball, Delany had to check his pull, gets a single to square leg
slower, dipping yorker, digs it out towards the bowler
bowls down the leg side after seeing the batsman coming out of his crease but too wide, a partial stop from the keeper allows one more
length ball looks to clear long-on but gets neither the distance nor the elevation and Rashid pouches it with the reverse cups
length outside off, cuts it towards third man
length ball outside off, sits up for Balbirnie who pulls it in front of the square leg
fuller on the pads, flicked towards the forward square leg
length outside off and cuts it behind the point fielder, third man had no chance
fuller and wider outside off, hits it towards deep cover
length outside off, chops it towards extra cover
slower length ball, Tector was moving across and looking to help it fine. Misses. The ball goes just over the stumps
fuller outside off and driven powerfully through the covers
slower length ball outside off, goes for the pull but misses
length ball at the stumps, Balbirnie gives the charge and hits it over deep midwicket, just clearing the boundary
slower and wider, Balbirnie was moving away but manages to get some bat on it, a single to deep extra cover
slower one again, cuts it towards short third man
length ball around off, pushes it over extra cover for a boundary
length ball at the stumps, swiped towards deep square leg
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover-point
length ball around off, looks to flick it on the leg side, gets an outside towards short third man
short and wide and cuts it past point. Zazai makes a mess of it at the boundary and concedes four
length outside off, cuts it towards point, Zazai was called in after the last ball and makes the stop
fuller but down the leg side, goes for the sweep but misses. An appeal for lbw but was going down
length outside of, cuts it towards deep point this time
a googly to start with, flicked towards midwicket
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
a sharp spinning legbreak. Surprises Balbirnie who was too late to play at it
short of length around off, cuts it towards point who gets a hand to it
fuller around off, comes forward and flicks it towards long-on
googly from outside off, cuts it past point but they will get only one as the sweeper quickly gets to it
length ball on the stumps, pushes towards midwicket
length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
fuller on the stumps, swept away towards deep-backward square leg
fired in at the stumps, pushed towards long-on
creates room and cuts it past extra cover, long-off comes across to keep it to two
fuller and just outside off, looks to give himself room again but mistimes it back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, gets an inside edge towards short fine leg
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards long-on
fuller around off, was looking to hit it through the off side but this is a googly, towards midwicket off the inner half
Samiullah Shinwari takes a good running catch to his left. Balbirnie goes for a slog sweep but loses his balance. Ends up hitting it in the air in front of square leg and Shinwari makes no mistake
fuller outside off. Drives it towards point
length ball around off, comes forward and defends
length ball around off, pushes it towards covers
length around off, pushes at it and gets a leading edge towards mid-off but the fielder is deep
a reverse sweep but cannot beat the short third man
length outside off, dabs it towards backward point
too full outside off, squeezes it out towards short third man
length around middle, sweeps it towards deep square leg
length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
legbreak, pushed towards the left of the bowler, Rashid dives to his left to make the stop
length ball, punched straight this time, Rashid gets a hand to it, but the deflection misses the stumps. The non-striker was out of his crease
a googly this time, brushes the pad as the batsman was looking to come down the track. Shapoor Zadran pulls it just inside the fine leg boundary
pushed towards mid-off
a big googly, was looking to cut but is cramped. Turn and bounce to hit the batsman high on the pads
length ball outside off, taps it towards cover-point
slower length ball, pulled towards deep midwicket, Rashid slides across to his right, gets to the ball but spills
length ball outside off, pushed towards extra cover for a quick single. A direct-hit from Asghar Afghan but the batsman was well in
length outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
length outside off, hits it towards extra cover but Asghar fumbles this time
fuller on the stumps, and scooped over short fine leg for four
a full toss from Mujeeb and loft towards long-on, the fielder cannot cut it off
length outside off, cuts it towards extra cover, a sliding stop but Janat to keep it to two
dragged short and pulled away over deep midwicket, can this be the game-changing over?
carrom ball, length around off and Tector had no idea about it, pushes at it and gets beaten
and again, this time Tector backs away and goes for the cut. Misses and the ball hits the top of the off
length outside off, backs away and cannot connect the cut
length ball outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but fails to connect
fuller outside off and smashed down the ground. Along the ground but long-off fails to spot it
goes for the pull but the ball hurries on to him. Only a single to deep midwicket

length ball around off, pulls it towards backward square leg. A direct hit would have been out. In fact, if the keeper was behind the stumps, that too would have resulted in the dismissal but instead he tried to deflect on to the stumps
length ball, pulled towards backward square leg
fuller around off, lofted towards long-on but fails to clear Nabi
fuller down the leg side, sweeps it towards square leg
fuller around off, backs away and lofts it straight down the ground. Long-off cannot reach there
a googly, chopped towards midwicket for a couple
length outside off, hits it towards long-off from the back foot
down the track, reaches to the pitch and smashes it over long-off
another googly, swept towards deep square leg
length ball around off, pulled towards long-on
length ball around off, pulled towards deep backward square leg
slower length ball outside off, Simi Singh comes down the track but fails to connect
length ball outside off, pulled towards deep midwicket for a single
fuller around off, hits it towards long-on for a couple. A direct hit at the bowler's end but Dockrell was in
fuller outside off, Singh cannot put bat on it
